messages.title: I don't want the Tories back because...
messages.content: Labour has supported families with Child Tax Credit, increases in Child Benefit and the Child Trust Fund. Tory cuts would risk all this.

messages.title: I don't want the Tories back because...
messages.content: Labour has delivered for pensioners with Pension Credit, Winter Fuel Payments and investment in public services. The Tories would cut our vital public services.

messages.title: I don't want the Tories back because...
messages.content: Labour has helped working people with Tax Credits, improved rights at work and the National Minimum Wage. The Tories would put all this at risk.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour supports families with initiatives like the Child Tax Credit, Child Benefit increases, and the Child Trust Fund.
Labour provides support for pensioners through Pension Credit, Winter Fuel Payments, and investment in public services.
Labour aids working people with Tax Credits, improved workplace rights, and the National Minimum Wage.

mentions.candidate: Ann McKechin is a proven fighter for local services.
mentions.tacticalSituation: People here in Glasgow North know that only Labour can stop the Tories - a vote for anyone else will let the Tories in.

issues.socialWelfare: Labour's policies benefit families, pensioners, and working people with various programs and initiatives.

endorsements.endorsement: Labour's support with Child Tax Credit, increases in Child Benefit and the Child Trust Fund is crucial.
Labour's delivery for pensioners with Pension Credit, Winter Fuel Payments is important.
Labour's help for working people with Tax Credits and rights at work is significant.
Ann McKechin is a proven fighter for our local services, and that's why she gets my vote.

quotes.text: Tory cuts would risk all this.

images.caption: Labour has supported families with Child Tax Credit, increases in Child Benefit and the Child Trust Fund.
Labour has delivered for pensioners with Pension Credit, Winter Fuel Payments and investment in public services.
Labour has helped working people with Tax Credits, improved rights at work and the National Minimum Wage.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on the potential negative consequences of voting for the Tories and emphasises Labour's achievements in supporting various groups.
